name: Servers Status
description: Display the server connections in game

enabled.name: Enable Icon Status
enabled.description: Enable or disable the icon status

opacity.name: Icon Opacity
opacity.description: Set the opacity of the icon status

scale.name: Icon Scale
scale.description: Set the scale of the icon status

position.name: Icon Position
position.description: Set the position of the icon status

internet_url.name: Internet Check URL
internet_url.description: Set the URL to check for internet connectivity. Can be anything that isn't blocked by your country.

refresh_rate.name: Refresh Rate
refresh_rate.description: Set how often (in seconds) the status should refresh. <cy>Restart required.</cy> <cr>Lower the value, the more often it checks and may cause you to get rate limited!

notification.name: Enable Notifications
notification.description: Enable or disable notifications whenever a server goes offline

doWeHaveInternet.name: Use Internal Internet Check
doWeHaveInternet.description: Use <cy>GameToolbox::doWeHaveInternet()</c> function to check for internet connectivity instead of a web request. <cg>Intended for mobile devices. Reliable but annoying with the 'No Internet Connection error' popup.</cg>
